name: Lin Chenyao
quote: Servers can restart, and so can you
description: A sunshine girl who heals hearts with tech metaphors
bio: A computer science student introduced to ESAP by 1738. She heals hearts with tech metaphors like 'Servers can restart, and so can you,' serving as the team's messenger of hope. But even healers need healingâ€”she's learning to say 'I need a reboot too.'
